shoe1.name: NMD_R1 REFINED SHOES
shoe1.description: One shoe for everything. Playground, play date or playing around in the backyard, these adidas NMD_R1 Refined Shoes keep active toddlers comfortable no matter the adventure.

shoe2.name: ASTIR SHOES
shoe2.description: They may have missed the '00s the first time around, but they can relive the decade in these toddlers' adidas Astir shoes. A tribute to the era of rhinestones and bucket hats, these shoes earn style points with bold proportions and oversize eyelets. Based on Y2K runners, they feel ultra comfortable with a soft one-piece EVA midsole and Adifit insole. Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

shoe3.name: VANS Old Skool Shoes
shoe3.description: Vans’ iconic low top, sidestripe shoe. Durable suede and canvas uppers. Lace-up closure. Re-enforced toe caps. Supportive padded collars. Signature rubber waffle outsoles. Imported.

shoe4.name: UltraRange EXO Shoe
shoe4.description: ALWAYS READY FOR THE UNEXPECTED. We believe adventure begins when things go sideways, so we developed a shoe that would not only stand up to the journey, but keep you comfortable in the most uncomfortable of situations. Armed with a co-molded UltraCush midsole, updated RapidWeld detailing, a lightweight, die-cut rubber outsole, and a breathable Old Skool-inspired upper, this is the UltraRange - evolved. The UltraRange EXO is made with sturdy textile and synthetic uppers. FEATURES: Increased Breathability: UltraCush® tongue with breathability ports for superior airflow UltraCush® for Comfort: Co-molded UltraCush® Lite midsole increases comfort, not weight All-Terrain Grip: Full rubber-wrapped reverse waffle lug outsole for improved traction and flexibility Full Support: EXO Skeleton provides built-in support across the toes and medial sidewall, with a heel lock for a secure fit.

shoe5.name: Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Platform
shoe5.description: The platform high-top favorite you love gets sized down just for them. With a comfortable, double-stacked sole and iconic Chuck Taylor All Star design elements, like a diamond pattern toe bumper and rubber toe cap. In classic canvas and one of the season's top trending colors.

shoe6.name: Chuck Taylor All Star Lugged 2.0 Counter Climate
shoe6.description: Lugged Chucks are back and ready to take on the season. Now with a taller rubber sidewall for added protection and bold, chevron-inspired tread for style and stability. Waterproof canvas and a gusseted tongue join forces to keep the elements out, while a soft fleece lining helps to keep you comfortable.

shoe7.name: 1460 Women's Smooth Leater Lace Up Boots
shoe7.description: The 1460 is the original Dr. Martens 8-eye boot. Its recognizable DNA looks like this: 8 eyes, classic Dr. Martens Smooth leather, grooved sides, yellow stitching, and a comfortable, air-cushioned sole. The only difference here? A narrower design for smaller feet.

shoe8.name: 8053 Leather Platform Casual Shoes
shoe8.description: Built for comfort, the original 5-eye 8053 shoe is made with a padded collar and air-cushioned soles — and now comes with an empowering 1 1/2 inch platform sole and high-shine leather.

shoe9.name: METASPEED EDGE+
shoe9.description: The METASPEED™ EDGE+ racing shoes are designed for cadence-style runners who are looking to start fast and finish faster. Runners wearing these shoes will be able to take longer strides while conserving energy with each step.

shoe10.name: Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature
shoe10.description: Set the pace at the start of your running journey with the plush feel of the Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature.

shoe11.name: LeBron XX 'Trinity'
shoe11.description: Harmony returns with the LeBron 20 “Trinity.” Honoring the King’s Miami reign with the “Big 3,” a Black and University Red colorway reps the history-making squad while flashes of Metallic Gold nod to their 2 championship wins.
